articles.author: Leafy Mate
articles.description: Since marijuana is still illegal under federal law, scientific research is very limited. Because of the way cannabis interacts with the human body’s endocannabinoid system, certain studies suggest that CBD may be beneficial for those who take birth control, while THC may present an increased risk for others. Further research will surely lead us to [...]
articles.title: Can You Smoke Weed on Birth Control?

articles.description: In honor of Father’s Day, Leafy Mate has compiled a list of cannabis-themed gifts for dear dad. articles.description: Cannabis used to enhance your hiking experience is an excellent way to get the most out of being outdoors. articles.author: Leafy Mate
articles.description: Created in a Canadian hospital, Rick Simpson Oil (RSO) is a cannabis oil known for its medical benefits, including relieving some cancer symptoms. It has a dark brown color and a thick consistency. You can apply it as a topical or consume it in an edible. Continue reading as we describe who Rick Simpson is [...]

articles.author: Leafy Mate
articles.description: Humans have used the cannabis plant as a sleep aid for many centuries. But why does weed make you sleepy? Certain cannabinoids have relaxing and soothing effects and can even make falling asleep easier. A recent study report that cannabis shortens the time it takes to fall asleep, both for sleep problems and for people who fall [...]
articles.title: Does Weed Make You Tired?

articles.author: Leafy Mate
articles.description: Edible marijuana includes any type of CBD or THC food or drinks that you can ingest. You can make medical cannabis edibles at home and there are also gummies, candies, brownies, and other edible cannabis products at dispensaries in legal states. Edibles often take longer to kick in, but they produce a relaxing body high [...]

articles.author: Leafy Mate
articles.description: What is PTSD? Post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) is a disorder that develops in some people who have experienced a severely shocking or dangerous event. It is typically a devastating condition that can lead to other mental illnesses if left untreated. Is PTSD associated with anxiety? Yes. According to the Anxiety & Depression Association of America [...]
articles.title: Best Strains That Help Alleviate PTSD Symptoms

articles.author: Leafy Mate
articles.description: Research shows that mild paranoid thoughts are relatively common, especially when under high stress. However, paranoia can be caused by bipolar disorder, related disorders, and many other factors. What is paranoia? Paranoia can be described as thinking and feeling like you are being threatened somehow, even if there is no evidence that it is happening [...]
